title: League won't open
body: I am currently unable to open the league of legends launcher. When I attempt to open the game I get a pop up that says "PVP.net Patch Kernel has stopped working". I have tried to reinstall and have uninstalled programs that may block it, but nothing is working. I haven't been able to play in over two weeks and would really appreciate some help.

replies.body: It sucks to hear you haven't been able to play for this long, and I'd like to see you back in game!  The kernel error usually occurs when your OS is blocking the patcher from launching or scanning game files.   Go through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have downloaded the Hextech Repair and have now uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times. I looked through the applications my windows was blocking and league was being accepted through the firewall. I am not sure what to do now. If you have any Idea please let me know because I have been playing for years and wouldn't want to lose the ability to now. Thank you very much and have a nice day.

No worries, we'll help you out!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into this with you individually.  The HRT should have also provided some logs which you can attach to the ticket for context.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can!
I am sorry for being such a bother, but I am unable to sign in to leave a support ticket
That's ok!  You can send an email to support@riotgames.com!
You've been such a help. Thank you for your time!
